content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 13, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft stripped_birch_wood. Stripped_birch_wood requires placing 1 stripped_birch_log in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the stripped_birch_log from slot 14 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 13, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]

thought: Since the stripped_birch_log has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the stripped_birch_log to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the stripped_birch_log to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 13, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]

thought: Since the stripped_birch_log has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the stripped_birch_log below it. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the stripped_birch_log to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 13, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]

thought: Since the stripped_birch_log has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the stripped_birch_log to the right of it. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move the stripped_birch_log to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 13, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the stripped_birch_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
